trends: There have been 27 other sightings in Gainesville
There were no other sightings in Gainesville on or around September 25th 2012
Summary: Right before pulling into driveway, we noticed 3 white lights in the shape of a triangle, hovering.
divs: Sighting DetailsPuling into my driveway, we noticed 3 white lights in the shape of a triangle hovering over 2 big trees. 1 light on top and 2 on the bottom. We saw it for about 3 seconds and couldn't believe what we saw. It took me 2 seconds to hit reverse and the lights were gone. As soon as we saw it, the gut feeling was UFO.
